feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Azure Stack HCI baseline reference architecture
entry.summary: Learn how to design Azure Stack hyperconverged infrastructure (HCI) for highly available virtualized and containerized workloads

entry.title: Azure Stack HCI three-node storage switchless architecture
entry.summary: Learn how to design Azure Stack HCI infrastructure by using a three-node storage switchless architecture.

entry.title: Image classification on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to build image processing into your applications by using Azure services such as the Computer Vision API and Azure Functions.

entry.title: Use Azure API Management in a multitenant solution
entry.summary: Learn about the features of Azure API Management that are useful when you work in multitenant solutions.

entry.summary: An overview of Microsoft Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) guidance offerings ranging from "just starting out", to production, and through sustained operations.

entry.summary: Learn how to protect APIs with API Management and Application Gateway.

entry.title: What is the Team Data Science Process?
entry.summary: Learn how the Team Data Science Process provides a data science methodology to deliver predictive analytics solutions and intelligent applications.

entry.title: Team Data Science Process for data scientists
entry.summary: Learn about the Team Data Science Process and Azure Machine Learning objectives that you can use to implement comprehensive data science solutions with Azure technologies.

entry.title: Azure IoT reference architecture
entry.summary: Learn about the recommended architecture for IoT applications on Azure that uses platform as a service (PaaS) components.

entry.title: Create smart places by using Azure Digital Twins
entry.summary: Use Azure Digital Twins to create models of smart places from IoT device data. View and control products, systems, environments, and experiences.

entry.title: Oracle Database with Azure NetApp Files
entry.summary: Implement a high-bandwidth, low-latency solution for Oracle Database workloads. Use Azure NetApp Files for enterprise-scale performance and reduced costs.

entry.title: Baseline highly available zone-redundant app services web application
entry.summary: A baseline reference architecture for a network secured, highly available, and zone-redundant App Service web application.

entry.title: Basic web application
entry.summary: Learn about proven practices for deploying web applications that use Azure App Service and Azure SQL Database.

entry.title: Priority Queue pattern
entry.summary: Prioritize requests sent to services so that requests with a higher priority are received and processed more quickly than those with a lower priority.

entry.title: Machine learning operations v2
entry.summary: Learn about a single deployable set of repeatable and maintainable patterns for creating machine learning CI/CD and retraining pipelines.

entry.title: Azure resource organization in multitenant solutions
entry.summary: This article describes how to organize your Azure resources in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Choose a batch processing technology
entry.summary: Compare technology choices for big data batch processing in Azure, including key selection criteria and a capability matrix.

entry.title: Refactor an IBM z/OS coupling facility
entry.summary: Learn how Azure services and components can provide scale-out performance comparable to IBM z/OS mainframe CF and Parallel Sysplex capabilities.

entry.title: Make all things redundant
entry.summary: Use these recommendations to avoid having single points of failure, by building redundancy into your application.

entry.title: Design for self healing
entry.summary: Learn to design resilient applications that can recover from failures without manual intervention through self-healing.

entry.title: Migrate a simple app from Service Fabric to AKS
entry.summary: Use an example to guide the migration of your application from Azure Service Fabric to Azure Kubernetes Service.

entry.title: Run a Linux VM on Azure
entry.summary: Learn the best practices for running a Linux virtual machine on Azure, which requires some additional components, including networking and storage resources.

entry.title: Cloud design patterns
entry.summary: Learn about design patterns for building reliable, scalable, secure applications in the cloud by walking through examples based on Microsoft Azure.

entry.summary: Learn about Azure cognitive services that you can use in AI applications and data flows. Choose the appropriate service for your use case.

entry.summary: The goals, tasks, and deliverables for the business understanding stage of your data science projects in the Team Data Science Process.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - Information retrieval phase
entry.summary: Learn about key decision points when you're configuring a search index. Learn about the various types of search you can perform such as vector, full text, hybrid, and hybrid manual. Finally, learn about breaking queries into subqueries, and why and how to rerank queries.

entry.title: Guide to designing and developing a RAG solution
entry.summary: Learn what you should consider when designing an LLM RAG solution, including determining what test documents and queries to use during evaluation, choosing a chunking strategy, determining what and how you should enrich the chunks, choosing the right embedding model, how to configure the search index, determining what searches you want to perform, and how to evaluate each step.

entry.summary: Learn how to build on the Azure OpenAI chat baseline architecture to address changes and expectations when you deploy it in an Azure landing zone.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - Chunking phase
entry.summary: Learn about the various chunking strategies like boundary based, custom code, and document analysis models. Also learn about how the document structure should influence your chunking strategy.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - Chunk enrichment phase
entry.summary: Learn about the importance of augmenting chunks with metadata like title, summary, keywords, entities, and more. Learn common cleaning operations you can perform on chunks that might improve vector matches.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - Generate embeddings phase
entry.summary: Learn about why your choice of embedding model can affect your vector search results and read guidance on how to choose an embedding model.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - Information retrieval phase
entry.summary: Learn about key decision points when you're configuring a search index. Learn about the various types of search you can perform such as vector, full text, hybrid, and hybrid manual. Finally, learn about breaking queries into subqueries, and why and how to rerank queries.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - LLM end to end evaluation phase
entry.summary: Learn about evaluating your RAG solution from end to end using key LLM and similarity metrics.

entry.summary: Learn what you should consider when gathering test documents and queries. You use these artifacts to test and validate your chunking, information retrieval, and prompt engineering strategies.

entry.summary: Learn what you should consider when designing an LLM RAG solution, including determining what test documents and queries to use during evaluation, choosing a chunking strategy, determining what and how you should enrich the chunks, choosing the right embedding model, how to configure the search index, determining what searches you want to perform, and how to evaluate each step.

entry.summary: Deploy Linux virtual machines and a virtual network configured for an N-tier architecture with Apache Cassandra in Microsoft Azure.

entry.title: Microsoft Entra IDaaS in security operations
entry.summary: Learn how security operations teams can use Microsoft Entra identity and access features in an adaptive, integrated zero-trust security architecture.

entry.title: Migrate a web app by using Azure API Management
entry.summary: In this scenario, an e-commerce company in the travel industry uses Azure API Management to migrate a legacy web application.

entry.title: AKS triageWorkload deployments
entry.summary: Learn how to check whether workload deployments and DaemonSet features are running properly. This step is part of the triage practices for an AKS cluster.

entry.title: AKS triageNode health
entry.summary: Learn about the triage step in which you examine the health of Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) worker nodes and pods and resolve issues.

entry.title: Quarantine pattern
entry.summary: Learn about the quarantine pattern, which stops software from getting deployed to production until marked as trusted by an intermediary process.

entry.title: Mission-critical baseline architecture on Azure
entry.summary: Architecture for a highly reliable workload that is accessed over a public endpoint and doesn't require private network connectivity to other company resources.

entry.title: Mission-critical baseline architecture with network controls
entry.summary: Architecture for a highly reliable workload with enhanced network controls such as private endpoints.

entry.title: Employee retention with Databricks and Kubernetes
entry.summary: Learn how to build, deploy, and monitor a machine learning model for employee attrition that can be integrated with external applications using Databricks and Kubernetes.

entry.title: Big data analytics on confidential computing
entry.summary: Use confidential computing on Kubernetes to run big data analytics with Apache Spark inside confidential containers that are protected by Intel Software Guard Extensions with data from Azure Data Lake and Azure SQL Database.

entry.title: Automated API deployments using APIOps
entry.summary: Use APIOps with an Azure API Management instance to build and deploy APIs. This solution provides self-service tools, auditing, policy enforcement, and early feedback.

entry.title: Map requests to tenants in a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article describes the considerations for mapping requests to tenants in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Pricing models for a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article describes the considerations for planning pricing models for a multitenant solution.

entry.title: AKS triageCluster health
entry.summary: Learn how to check the overall health of an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster, as part of a triage step for AKS clusters.

entry.title: Quantum computing integration with classical apps
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Quantum to implement hybrid quantum applications

entry.title: Apache Sqoop migration to Azure
entry.summary: Learn about Apache Sqoop and about ways to migrate a Sqoop implementation to Azure by using Azure services like VMs, HDInsight and Data Factory.

entry.title: Azure DNS Private Resolver
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure DNS Private Resolver to simplify hybrid recursive domain name system (DNS) resolution for on-premises and Azure workloads.

entry.title: Kubernetes node and node pool management
entry.summary: Understand Kubernetes nodes and node pools, how to handle Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) nodes and node pools, and node pool options for Amazon EKS and AKS.

entry.title: Enable real-time sync of MongoDB Atlas data changes to Azure Synapse Analytics
entry.summary: Learn how to keep Azure Synapse Analytics data pools synchronized with operational data changes in MongoDB Atlas.

entry.title: Build the second layer of defense with Microsoft Defender XDR Security services
entry.summary: Add additional security to your IT environment by using Microsoft 365 security service in addition to Azure security. This article is part of a series.

entry.title: Recover from loss of an Azure region
entry.summary: Design resilient, highly available, fault-tolerant applications and plan for disaster recovery.

entry.title: AKS day-2 guide: Patch and upgrade guidance
entry.summary: Learn about day-2 patching and upgrading practices for Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) worker nodes and Kubernetes versions.

entry.title: Azure Well-Architected Framework review of an Azure NAT gateway
entry.summary: Learn about best practices for an Azure NAT gateway, based on the Azure Well-Architected Framework five pillars of architectural excellence.

entry.title: Related resources for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article provides a set of links and resources for architects and developers of multitenant solutions.

entry.title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) that are useful when working with multitenanted systems. It links to guidance and examples for how to use AKS in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Hybrid Cross-Cluster Scaling with Azure Arc for the workloads deployed on Azure Stack HCI
entry.summary: Perform cross-cluster scaling of on-premises workloads by using Azure Arc, Traffic Manager, or Front Door and then deploy by using Azure Pipelines.

entry.title: Valet Key pattern
entry.summary: Use a token or key that provides clients with restricted direct access to a specific resource or service.

entry.title: Large-scale custom natural language processing
entry.summary: Implement a custom natural language processing (NLP) solution in Azure. Use Spark NLP for tasks like topic and sentiment detection and analysis.

entry.title: Many models machine learning with Azure Machine Learning
entry.summary: Many machine learning problems are too complex for a single machine learning model to solve. Learn about many models machine learning at scale with Azure Machine Learning.

entry.title: Many models machine learning with Spark
entry.summary: Often machine learning (ML) problems are too complex for a single ML model to solve. Learn about many models machine learning at scale in Azure with Spark.

entry.title: Customer lifetime value and churn prediction with Azure AI services
entry.summary: Learn how to create a solution for predicting customer lifetime value and churn using Azure Machine Learning.
